Text:
Its not fake content or something like this.

Yeah thanks it works. Only problem is it turns off the autosave / intro and my own profiles. There's 5 profiles and all of them are called displayname00 01 02 03 and 04. Can't owerwrite/delete them. Can you fix this too?

To fix that problem just delete all the files from the Fifa12 folder in My documents and also delete the rna.ini file.

Enjoy.
If you're having any problems, just post here.
Yeah that works, might want to put it in the upload notes. Cheers quality upload.

I hope people read the comments.

But thanks man :-)

Support is apreciated.

Nope.. For all of you, you can delete the Rna file, its not necessary for the gamepad!
That's the problem. If I delete the file, the game will keep the problem. The fifaconfig file is from FIFA11, so I can't use that.
fifa 12 key. if anybody knows it post it plz plz dying to play the game

Well.. Guys, do this.

Go to the fifa11 config.. Configurate the buttons and stuff.

Then, go to my documents, Fifa 11, and copy the file "buttonDataSetup.ini" to the game folder of Fifa 12.

Capiche?

I hope theres not any doubt after this.

:-)

But.. If you still need help, dont be afraid to comment.
